Re More »Portland city leers and residents push back against ICE as Trump sends in troopsU.S. braces for Hurricane Imelda to hit East CoastThe 'die with zero' mindset is set to reshape the Great Wealth TransferSub discovers unexploded WWII bombs teeming with marine lifeRussia hits Ukraine with 593 drones and 50 missiles as NATO scrambles jetsStories for you World·Associated PressUkraine nuclear plant enters fifth day on emergency power as Zelenskyy announces $90B arms dealUkraine’s Russian-occupied Zaporizhzhia nuclear power plant entered its fifth day running on emergency generators Saturday, prompting mounting safety concerns. President Volodymyr Zelenskyy, meanwhile, announced a $90 billion arms agreement with the United States and criticized Hungary for carrying out "dangerous” intelligence-gathering drone activities over Ukraine. External power to the Zaporizhzhia nuclear power plant, Europe's largest, has been cut for more than four days in a record outag5 min re Thanks for your feedback! In marquee speeches and other settings, many of them have mentioned Trump and his policies, be it obliquely or directly.
